school_name: Parsons The New School For Design
tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Hilarious (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: LECTURE HEAVY  GET READY TO READ  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Grades heavily on attendance - once even marked attendance 10 minutes before class was scheduled to start and marked everyone who came \'late\' as tardy. Lectures are long and monotonous. Heavy amount of reading and assignments assigned each week - be prepared to spend at least a few hours doing the weekly homework..
